name: The Golden Dreadnought
description: A classic dreadnought body shape with a solid spruce top and rosewood back and sides, delivering a warm, resonant tone.

name: Stratosphere Custom
description: Designed for versatility, this electric guitar features a lightweight alder body and three single-coil pickups for that iconic sound.

name: Vintage Vibe Tele
description: A throwback to the golden era of rock, featuring a butterscotch blonde finish and a maple neck for snappy articulation.

name: Deep Hollow Jazz
description: Perfect for jazz and blues, this hollow body guitar offers a rich, airy tone with a sleek sunburst finish.

name: Modern Standard HSS
description: A modern workhorse with a humbucker bridge pickup for thick leads and single coils for distinct cleans.

name: Midnight Special
description: Handcrafted with a cedar top and mahogany body, this guitar produces a mellow, intimate sound perfect for fingerstyle.

name: Sunburst Les Paul
description: The definitive rock machine with a solid mahogany body and maple cap, delivering endless sustain and power.

name: The Minimalist Parlor
description: Small body, big heart. This parlor guitar is travel-friendly without sacrificing tonality or projection.
